Exaggerate: The claim may exaggerate the response of the German government by stating that they "reply" to the attack on Ekweremadu, implying that they have taken a strong stance against the Nigerian government.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks sufficient evidence to support the assertion that the German government has replied to the attack on Ekweremadu.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the attack on Ekweremadu was carried out by activists claiming to be from the Indigenous People of Biafra (IPOB) group, without providing concrete evidence to support this assumption.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim does not consider alternative explanations for the attack on Ekweremadu, such as personal grievances or political motivations.
